column6:
It's Marvel's fighting females vs. Russia's #1 super team! Charging into a land in desperate need of their help, the Lady Liberators collide with the Winter Guard! That's right, She-Hulk is fighting a bear on the cover - but that's no average bear, Boo Boo...it's Ursa Major! And he'll get no picnic basket from special guest-stars Valkyrie, Thundra and the Invisible Woman!,2008,11
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | inker:Vincenzo Acunzo | inker:Mike Deodato | colorist:Rainier Beredo | colorist:Barbara Ciardo | writer:Peter David | penciller:Pasquale Qualano | letterer:Dave Sharpe
